title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2510.3 - Scope of review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2510.3 - Scope of review

State Regulations

Review pursuant to this Part shall be limited to the
facts or evidence before a district rent administrator as raised in the
petition. Where the petitioner submits with the petition certain facts or
evidence which he or she establishes could not reasonably have been offered or
included in the proceeding prior to the issuance of the order being appealed, the proceeding may be remanded for determination to the district rent
administrator to consider such facts or evidence. Proceedings remanded back to
the division following an Article 78 may be reconsidered, at the discretion of
the commissioner, without being remanded to the rent
administrator. Notes

2510.3

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
